definition: recently/until now/up to the present/lately/also written 邇來|迩来
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: Harshire is risking everything by coming here.
sentences.chinese: 哈什爾來這裏把一切都豁出去了。

sentences.english: We decided to go with the gal from Merrill.
sentences.chinese: 我們決定和那個從梅里爾來的女孩合作。
